credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Theater Design: A Town Square
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray, blue, pale rose wash on white laid paper
description: Court surrounded by arcade in the background to the left building with dome and small towers either side, having appearance of a church but there are no ecclesiastical morifs.
name: Drawing
